exception_handling_service.firefox_private_browsing_or_no_space: Something went wrong. Please check that you are not using Firefox in the unsupported private browsing mode and that your device has the recommended 500 MB of free space.
exception_handling_service.network_request_failed: A network request failed. Some functionality may be unavailable.
exception_handling_service.out_of_space: An error occurred because your device is out of storage space.

file_service.failed_to_save: Failed to save your changes. Please check that you have the recommended 500 MB of free space on your device.
file_service.storage_space_is_limited: The storage space on this device is limited. It is recommended to have a minimum of 500 MB of free space to ensure all feature are available. Please free up storage space.

issue_email.body:
Thanks for reporting the issue!
It would help us if you fill out some of the information below, but please submit even if you can't fill out much.
If you are requesting a feature many of the fields may not be applicable.
Be aware your bug report will be publicly available. Never submit passwords or other secrets.

Bug report
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

Steps to reproduce
For example:
1. Go to ...
2. Click on ...
3. Scroll down to ...
4. See error

Actual behavior
Please describe actual behavior of the issue you are observing.

Expected behavior
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

Screenshots
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your issue.

Additional context
Add any other context about the problem here.

Possible solution
Add any possible solutions to the problem here.

Your environment:
Software                 Version
-----------------------------------------
{{ siteName }} - {{ siteVersion }}
{{ browserName }} - {{ browserVersion }}
{{ operatingSystem }} - {{ operatingSystemVersion }}

URL: {{ url }}
Error id: {{ errorId }}
